articles.author: Nathan Falde
articles.title: Massive Climate Catastrophe Froze Europe's Earliest Humans to Death - Ancient Origins
articles.description: An interdisciplinary team of archaeologists, anthropologists and earth scientists have found evidence that a severe cooling event in the North Atlantic region approximately 1.1 million years ago wiped out all the archaic humans that populated Europe at that t…
